Package com.ee364project.helpers

Class Ratio

java.lang.Object
com.ee364project.helpers.Ratio
public class Ratio extends Object
The Ratio class represents a ratio value between 0 and 1. It provides basic arithmetic operations and comparison methods for ratios.
Version:
1.1.0
Author:
Team 2

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description

    Constructs a Ratio object with a random value between 0 and 1.

    Constructs a Ratio object with the same value as the given ratio.

    • compare

      public int compare(Ratio other, double tol)
      Compares this ratio to another ratio with a specified tolerance.
      Parameters:
      other - The ratio to compare to.
      tol - The tolerance value for the comparison.
      Returns:
      0 if the ratios are equal within the tolerance, 1 if this ratio is greater, -1 if the other ratio is greater.

    • compare

      Compares this ratio to another ratio with the default tolerance.

      Returns:
      0 if the ratios are equal within the default tolerance, 1 if this ratio is greater, -1 if the other ratio is greater.
